# Interface MemoryRetrieveNodeExecutionConfig

Configuration for executing memory retrieve nodes

This interface was referenced by `InworldBasicConfigurationSchema`'s JSON-Schema via the `definition` "MemoryRetrieveNodeExecutionConfig".

interface MemoryRetrieveNodeExecutionConfig {  
report_to_client?: string | boolean;  
return_rolling_summary?: string | boolean;  
}

##### Index

### Properties

report_to_client? return_rolling_summary?

## Properties

### `Optional`report_to_client

report_to_client?: string | boolean

Whether to report node execution result to the client

### `Optional`return_rolling_summary

return_rolling_summary?: string | boolean

Whether to include the rolling summary in the returned knowledge records
